import re
import urllib
import urllib.request
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def safe_url(link):
link = link.replace('preview','i')
pos = link.find('?')
token = link[pos:len(link)]
return link.replace(token,'')

def is_valid(link):
return 'redditstatic' not in link

def find(url):

req = urllib.request.Request(url, headers={'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0'})
page = urllib.request.urlopen(req).read()
soup = BeautifulSoup(page,'html.parser')
title = soup.title.string
print(title)
taglist = soup.find_all(['p','img'])
text_string = ''
target_str = '[/img]'
for tr in taglist:
if tr.text:
text_string += tr.text
text_string += '\n'
else:
text_string += ''
text_string += safe_url(tr['src'])
text_string += '\n'

pos = text_string.rfind(target_str)

text_string = text_string[0:pos + len(target_str)]
text_string = text_string.split('\n')
text_string = filter(is_valid, text_string)
text_string = '\n'.join(text_string)
print(text_string)
